column4: ok, I've just had my system hang for the third time in as many days.  I need to know what log files I can look at to help me figure out why this is happening.  I'm running on a freshly installed copy of kubuntu gutsy.  Any suggestions?
including Magic SysRq keys (google) and Ctrl+Alt+F1 ?
yes to ctrl-alt-f1.  I don't think I have a sysrq key defined.  I'm using an older Type M (101) keyboard which does have a SysRq key, but I never defined it.
I see that the sysrq key is actually a key combo.  let me print the page for future reference
